name: Pegasus Wow Bot

screenshots.caption: Pegasus Viewer showing the status of the bot
Pegasus Map Showing the map of the coordinates where a x marcks the character current place

short_description:
One year ago, on my last vacation I challenged myself to make a non detectable world of warcraft bot that could travel without human interference.

I have seen video's of people doing this so I decided I had to try to make it by my own as a mere chalenge.

I did it. 

It worked.

It is not amazing as other stuff you may find on internet.

It still needs improvement.

I won't improve it anymore.

I am posting its code here and making it open source so anyone who wants will be able to download the code and give it a try.

-----------

BY DOWNLOADING AND USING OR MODIFYING THIS SOFTWARE YOU AGREE THAT YOUR USE OF THE SOFTWARE IS SOLELY AT YOUR OWN RISK. YOU AGREE THAT ALL THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS," AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS.

NONE OF THE AUTHORS, CONTRIBUTORS, PROGRAMMERS, SPONSORS, ADMINISTRATORS OR ANYONE WHO DISTRIBUTES ANY COPY OF IT, IN ANY WAY WHATSOEVER, CAN BE RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR USE OF THE SOFTWARE AND THE CONSEQUENCES OF THIS USE.
summary: The goal is to try to develop a non detectable world of warcraft bot.
